writings.text: 柳の下にいつも泥鰌はいない
柳の下に何時も泥鰌は居ない

readings.text: やなぎのしたにいつもどじょうはいない

furigana.writing: 柳の下に何時も泥鰌は居ない

glossary: a fox is not taken twice in the same snare
good luck does not always repeat itself
there are no birds in last year's nest
there aren't always loach under the willow tree
